**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 2,400 gp **Usage** affixed to a weapon **Activate**([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Trigger** Your Strike damages a target --- Made from a treated sliver of cold iron, this talisman allows you to counteract magical effects. When you activate the dispelling sliver, it attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a single spell active on the target (counteract modifier +29), with the effects of an 8th-rank [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) spell.
If you activate the talisman on a successful [Dispelling Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=594), the talisman attempts to counteract all spells active on the target, in addition to your attempt from Dispelling Slice.
name: Dispelling Sliver
